solution_line_template: First find Carolyn's total violin practice time by tripling her piano practice time: {piano_minutes_per_day} minutes/day * {violin_multiplier} = <<{piano_minutes_per_day}*{violin_multiplier}={violin_minutes_per_day}>>{violin_minutes_per_day} minutes/day

Then find the total amount of time she spends practicing each day: {violin_minutes_per_day} minutes/day + {piano_minutes_per_day} minutes/day = <<{violin_minutes_per_day}+{piano_minutes_per_day}={total_minutes_per_day}>>{total_minutes_per_day} minutes/day

Then find the total time she spends practicing each week: {total_minutes_per_day} minutes/day * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{total_minutes_per_day}*{days_per_week}={total_minutes_per_week}>>{total_minutes_per_week} minutes/week

Then find the total time she spends practicing each month: {total_minutes_per_week} minutes/week * {weeks_per_month} weeks/month = <<{total_minutes_per_week}*{weeks_per_month}={total_minutes_per_month}>>{total_minutes_per_month} minutes/month
